text:
Q: What investment services do you offer?
A: We offer a comprehensive range of investment services including: stocks and bonds trading, mutual funds, ETFs, retirement planning (401k, IRA), wealth management, and personalized portfolio advisory services.

Q: What are your fees for investment services?
A: Our fees vary by service: Trading commission is $0 for stocks/ETFs, Managed portfolios have a 0.25% annual fee, Advisory services start at 0.75% annually. Contact us for a detailed fee schedule.

Q: How do I start investing with you?
A: To start investing: 1) Create an account online or talk to an advisor, 2) Choose your investment strategy, 3) Fund your account, 4) Begin investing with our guidance.

Q: How do I reset my password?
A: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

Q: How can I contact support?
A: You can contact support via email at support@yourcompany.com or through our live chat.

Q: Is my personal information secure with your platform?
A: Yes, we use bank-level encryption and multi-factor authentication to ensure your data and transactions are protected at all times.

Q: Can I transfer my existing investments to your platform?
A: Yes, you can initiate an account transfer from your existing broker using our automated ACAT system. This typically takes 5–7 business days.

Setting up your account
To set up your account, follow these steps: Visit our website, click 'Sign Up', provide your personal and financial details, and verify your identity through our secure KYC process.

Troubleshooting login issues
If you experience login issues, try clearing your browser cache, disabling browser extensions, or resetting your password. Ensure cookies are enabled in your browser.

Understanding your portfolio dashboard
Your portfolio dashboard provides a real-time overview of your holdings, performance metrics, recent transactions, and personalized investment insights.

Withdrawing funds from your account
To withdraw funds, navigate to the 'Transfers' section, select 'Withdraw', choose your linked bank account, and enter the desired amount. Transfers may take 1–3 business days.

Updating your contact information
To update your contact details, log in to your account, go to 'Settings', and select 'Personal Info'. Make sure to save changes before exiting.

Mobile app not syncing data
If the mobile app is not syncing, ensure you have a stable internet connection. Try force closing the app, clearing the app cache, or reinstalling it from the App Store or Google Play.

Q: What happens if the market crashes?
A: We recommend a diversified long-term investment strategy. Our advisory team is available to help you adjust your portfolio as needed during market volatility.

Q: Do you offer tax-loss harvesting?
A: Yes, our managed portfolios include automated tax-loss harvesting to help offset your capital gains and optimize your tax outcomes.
